ingredients.item: 2½ tbsp Bart Red Thai Curry Paste
250g Cooks’ Ingredients Frozen Butternut Vine Squash
180g pack extra large raw king prawns
½ x 25g pack Thai basil, leaves only, larger ones roughly chopped

instructions.step: Prepare the vermicelli noodles according to the pack instructions, then drain under cold water.

Warm the curry paste in a medium saucepan over a medium heat for 2 minutes, then add the butternut squash, coconut milk and fish stock. Season and simmer briskly for 10 minutes. Reduce the heat, add the prawns and simmer for 3 minutes. Season.

Divide the noodles between two large, shallow bowls. Spoon the butternut and prawns into the bowls, then ladle the broth on top. Scatter over the cashews and basil leaves, and serve with lime wedges to squeeze over.
